description: The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) have a requirement for accommodations, cleaning, laundry, and parking services in the Wiesbaden, Germany area.
full_summary:
Government of Canada Tender Announcement
=================================================================

**Hotel Accommodations - Wiesbaden, Germany**

### Tender Details

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01030572
**Solicitation Number:** W8484-230446/A
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-22
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-06T09:00:00 (already expired)

### Tender Brief

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals from qualified service providers for hotel accommodations, cleaning, laundry, and parking services in the Wiesbaden, Germany area.

### Procurement Method

This is a request for proposal (RFP) tender, open to all qualified suppliers. Prequalified suppliers must demonstrate experience in providing accommodations and related services to military personnel and/or government agencies.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

This opportunity is available internationally, specifically in Germany.

### Regions of Delivery

The contracted services will be delivered in Germany.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of National Defence, located at 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada.

### Contact Information

* Chelsea Fowler, Contracting Authority: `chelsea.fowler@forces.gc.ca`

### Attachments

The following documents are available for review:

* [RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/22/252ecc0cd5231dd9a395c7de2a1abed2/w8484-230446_eng_rfp.pdf)
* [Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/29/ca93fb956ba0867deb024e9354f0ba96/w8484-230446_eng_amendment_001.pdf)
* [Amendment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/05/ca48955d8b60d42439ad035656b5ca73/w8484-230446_eng_amendment_002.pdf)
* [RFP Document (Français)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/22/51cdf7cf55bfe6e9ce9b23015d3152a0/w
